imdb.plot outline: When the reclusive poet laureate, Portia Grey, starts a writers' group, six women can't stay away. From all walks of life -- a mother, a solider, a pastor's only child, a teenager, a detective and a wizened woman in her eighties -- the writers gather every week in the hundred-year-old arts center at the edge of Port Laurel. And as they wait for the laureate to make her grand appearance, the secrets and lies begin to build up in the mysterious sitting room. "The Laurels" is an eight-episode, prime time mini series drama (airing to three million Washington State homes in 2016) about six diverse writers each with their own secrets. When the elusive and mysterious poet laureate invites local authors to her writers' group, no one knows what to expect. But over the course of eight episodes, strangers become friends, enemies, rivals and more. And what about Ms. Grey herself? Will she ever grace The Laurels sitting group with her presence?
imdb.title: The Laurels
plot: When the reclusive poet laureate, Portia Grey, starts a writers' group, six women can't stay away. From all walks of life -- a mother, a solider, a pastor's only child, a teenager, a detective and a wizened woman in her eighties -- the writers gather every week in the hundred-year-old arts center at the edge of Port Laurel. And as they wait for the laureate to make her grand appearance, the secrets and lies begin to build up in the mysterious sitting room. "_The Laurels_ (qv)" is an eight-episode, prime time mini series drama (airing to three million Washington State homes in 2016) about six diverse writers each with their own secrets. When the elusive and mysterious poet laureate invites local authors to her writers' group, no one knows what to expect. But over the course of eight episodes, strangers become friends, enemies, rivals and more. And what about Ms. Grey herself? Will she ever grace _The Laurels_ (qv) sitting group with her presence?::Jennifer DiMarco
